activities.title: Flight from Bangalore to Jaipur
activities.description: Early morning flight departure from Bengaluru Airport to Jaipur Airport

activities.title: Hotel Check-in and Freshen Up
activities.description: Check into your hotel, freshen up and have breakfast

activities.title: City Palace Complex
activities.description: Explore the magnificent City Palace with its courtyards, gardens, and museums showcasing royal artifacts

activities.title: Traditional Rajasthani Lunch
activities.description: Enjoy authentic Rajasthani thali at a local restaurant

activities.title: Hawa Mahal (Palace of Winds)
activities.description: Visit the iconic pink sandstone palace with its intricate latticed windows

activities.title: Johari Bazaar Shopping
activities.description: Shop for traditional Rajasthani jewelry, textiles, and handicrafts

activities.title: Dinner at Rooftop Restaurant
activities.description: Enjoy dinner with a view of the illuminated city

activities.title: Evening Stroll at Albert Hall
activities.description: Take a peaceful evening walk around the beautifully lit Albert Hall Museum
activities.location: Albert Hall Museum, Ram Niwas Garden

activities.title: Early Morning Hotel Breakfast
activities.description: Quick breakfast at the hotel before heading out

activities.title: Amber Fort (Amer Fort)
activities.description: Explore the magnificent Amber Fort with its stunning architecture, mirror palace, and elephant rides

activities.title: Jal Mahal (Water Palace)
activities.description: Photo stop at the beautiful Water Palace surrounded by Man Sagar Lake

activities.title: Lunch at Local Restaurant
activities.description: Enjoy traditional Rajasthani dal baati churma and other local delicacies

activities.title: Jantar Mantar Observatory
activities.description: Visit the UNESCO World Heritage astronomical observatory with ancient instruments

activities.title: Bapu Bazaar Shopping
activities.description: Shop for textiles, leather goods, and souvenirs at the famous Bapu Bazaar

activities.title: Farewell Dinner
activities.description: Special farewell dinner with traditional Rajasthani folk music and dance

activities.title: Hotel Check-out and Departure Prep
activities.description: Pack belongings and prepare for departure

activities.title: Flight to Bangalore
activities.description: Late night flight back to Bangalore
